CutSceneText.Text: Darling!
Didn't I tell you to fill the hole in the sandbag by today?!
Do you find the things I say not worth listening to?!
Hey! Just a moment! Just listen to me for a minute!
It is not that I did not want to do it myself, but...
Be quiet!
The Latuson Family Ultimate~!
Genuine Fiery Sky Whirlwind Dance!
Wait for me here for a moment. I'll be back after a little chat with my wife.
Oh my god! Where have you been?!
Didn't I tell you to fill the sandbag with sand by today or not?!
...Why don't you get a servant to do that? Why do you keep telling me to do such petty tasks?
It's because you are a weakling! Don't you know only the strong gets treated well in our family?
I wouldn't be doing this to you if you were a strong man!
Then I'll prove it to you that I'm not a weakling. What would it take for you to acknowledge that I am strong?
Mm~ then I will recognize you if you could hunt and bring back the body of a [Crestlich] from the [Ishalgen Wilderness].
Great. I will go and catch a [Crestlich] for you.
You? Someone who can't even handle a weapon properly? Hahaha, are you trying to make me laugh to death?!
Just wait. This time I'll definitely...
Honey, I am back. Come and have a look at this.
What's this... a Crestlich! Did you really...?
This is proof that I risked my life to catch this Crestlich. Well?
Amazing...
Will you now acknowledge that I am not a weakling?
Of course. So you were actually someone strong... Have you been hiding it intentionally all this time?
Well, I gue-guess you could say that. It's rather ungainly to show off strength to your wife as well, you know.
You did. Okay... From now on, I will not look down on you or hit you for no reason.
I love you, darling...
This is a little embarrassing. It's ok, since you know now. Hahaha... Hahaha... Hahahaha...
